Business_Process_Parameters.description: When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.

Indicates the transaction should process to completion before the response is generated.  Note: All < v12 operations will process with Run_Now = True for backwards compatibility but please review this setting in your environment for performance conditions.

Enforces all validation conditions defined on the initiation step.  If any condition is true, the validation error blocks the step from exiting and a business process event isn't created. The attribute is currently not available for use. It will be generally available for all web services in a future release.

validation.validation: Discard on Exit Validation Error

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Free form comment regarding the business process.

validation.validation: This Business Process has been configured to disable comment. Please remove the comment or change the setting in the Business Process Policy or tenant setup.

WorkerObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

WorkerObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

WorkerObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Default the Person making the comment to the processing person if not submitted via the web service.

description: Container for the processing options for a business process. If no options are submitted (or the options are submitted as 'false') then the business process is simply initiated as if it where submitted on-line with approvals, reviews, notifications and to-do's in place. If the Initiator is an Integration System User, any validations you configured on the Initiation step are ignored.

From Date of the vesting schedule.
Expiration date of the stock grant.

validation.validation: Expiration Date must be on or after the Vest From Date.

Add_Individual_Stock_Grant_Data.description: Number of shares granted for a unit stock plan.

validation.validation: Shares Granted may only be entered if the Stock Plan is a Unit Plan.

Add_Individual_Stock_Grant_Data.description: Percent of compensation basis allotted to stock grant for a percent stock plan. Cannot exceed 10,000% of employee base pay.

validation.validation: Percent may only be entered if the Stock Plan is either a Percent or Amount Plan.

Add_Individual_Stock_Grant_Data.description: Amount allotted for stock grant for an amount stock plan. Cannot exceed 10,000% of employee base pay.

validation.validation: Amount may only be entered if the Stock Plan is either a Percent or Amount Plan.

Add_Individual_Stock_Grant_Data.description: Currency of the stock grant. Required for both percent or amount.

validation.validation: Grant Amount Currency must be entered if Grant Amount or Grant Percent is entered. When a percent is entered, an amount is automatically calculated from the percent so a currency is required.

Use Target Currency set on Stock Plan.  Currency applied must be the currency specified in the Stock Plan and Stock Plan Profiles. For Position: [position], and Stock Plan: [stock plan] combination, the currency should be [target currency] instead of [currency].

Add_Individual_Stock_Grant_Data.description: Grant price for the stock grant.

validation.validation: Grant Price and Grant Price Currency are only valid for unit based long term cash category grants. Please remove Grant Price and Grant Price Currency to proceed.

Comments of the stock grant.
Number of shares vested. Applies to options or grants only.

validation.validation: Shares Vested, Vesting Price, and Vested As Of are only valid for board approved stock grants.  Please remove Shares Vested, Vesting Price, and Vested As Of to proceed.
validation.description: Shares Vested, Vesting Price, and Vested As Of are only valid for board approved stock grants.

validation.validation: Shares Vested cannot be more than Shares Granted.
validation.description: Shares Vested cannot be more than Shares Granted.

validation.validation: Shares Vested plus Shares Unvested cannot be greater than Shares Granted.

Add_Individual_Stock_Grant_Data.description: Number of shares unvested. Applies to options or grants only.

validation.validation: Shares Unvested cannot be more than Shares Granted.
Shares Vested, Vesting Price, and Vested As Of are only valid for board approved stock grants.
Shares Vested plus Shares Unvested cannot be greater than Shares Granted.

Please remove Long Term Cash Amount Vested, Long Term Cash Amount Unvested, Vesting Price, and Vested As Of, or update Board Approval to proceed.

Long Term Cash Amount Unvested cannot be more than Amount Granted.
